scripts.build:vm: npm run build && scripts/env_wrapper.sh mkosi --profile=gcp -I tdx-dummy.conf
scripts.build:vm:incremental: npm run build && scripts/env_wrapper.sh mkosi -i --profile=gcp -I tdx-dummy.conf
scripts.build:vm:clean: npm run build && scripts/env_wrapper.sh mkosi --force --profile=gcp -I tdx-dummy.conf
